title: Great Sand Dunes National Park & Preserve: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets         During summer days, plan to keep your pet on the moist, cool sand near Medano Creek. Access the dunes with your pet only in early morning or evening to avoid 150 degree F sand.Â  NPS/Scott Hansen  Printable Pet Guidelines and Map of Permitted Areas (.pdf file, 1MB, updated April 2015)
